text: Kathryn Hahn (born July 23, 1973) is an American actress. She played Lily for six years in the television program Crossing Jordan on NBC. She played a hippie in the sitcom Our Idiot Brother, also on NBC. She also played Karen in the movie Wanderlust. Hahn was born in Westchester, Illinois, near Chicago. She was raised near Cleveland, Ohio. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Illinois Category:1973 births Category:Living people
title: Kathryn Hahn
